thread.title: 'Ant-Man' Director Peyton Reed in Negotiations to Return for Sequel
thread.title_full: 'Ant-Man' Director Peyton Reed in Negotiations to Return for Sequel

title: 'Ant-Man' Director Peyton Reed in Negotiations to Return for Sequel
text:
'Ant-Man' Director Peyton Reed in Neg... 'Ant-Man' Director Peyton Reed in Negotiations to Return for Sequel Next Story Prev Story 10 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
Less than two weeks after dating a slew of movies including an Ant-Man sequel for 2018, the studio is in negotiations with Peyton Reed to return as director of Ant-Man and the Wasp . It marks one of the first deals surrounding Marvel's recently dated movies.   Hollywood Reporter.
